translation.en: ♪ How, what, where, why? ♪ ♪ What, where, why? How, what, where, why? ♪
translation.ko: 어떻게, 뭘, 어디서, 왜? 뭘, 어디서, 왜?

translation.en: ♪ What, where, why? Ada Twist, scientist ♪
translation.ko: 어떻게, 뭘, 어디서, 왜? 뭘, 어디서, 왜? 과학자 에이다의 위대한 말썽

translation.en: ♪ She's gonna find out What the answer is ♪
♪ Under here, over there ♪
♪ Science is everywhere you look ♪
♪ With Iggy Peck, architect ♪
♪ And Rosie Revere, engineer ♪
♪ So much to do ♪
♪ And you can help too! ♪
♪ A mystery, a riddle A puzzle, or a quest ♪
♪ There are wonders to discover And hypotheses to test ♪
♪ Science is the best! Ada Twist, scientist ♪
translation.ko: 과학이 최고야! 과학자 에이다의 위대한 말썽

translation.en: ♪ She's gonna find out What thе answer is ♪
♪ Everywherе science is She's forming a hypothesis ♪
translation.ko: 과학은 어디에나 있어 가설을 세우고 퍼즐 조각을 맞춰

translation.en: ♪ Connecting polka dots 'Cause this is scientist, Ada Twist! ♪
translation.ko: 가설을 세우고 퍼즐 조각을 맞춰 과학자 에이다 트위스트니까! "과학자 에이다의 위대한 말썽"

translation.en: Ladybug's got eyes on the new neighbors' house.
translation.ko: 여기는 무당벌레 새 이웃집을 정찰 중이다

translation.en: A turntable? So, they like music.
Dragon, Whale Shark, any intel? Over.
[squeals] I think your new neighbors are unicorns! -Over. -[Iggy] Huh?
translation.ko: 새 이웃은 유니콘인 거 같다! 오버

translation.en: Ah! Their evil bot dog's trying to take over the world! Over.
translation.ko: 세상을 정복하려는 사악한 로봇 개도 있다! 오버

translation.en: -Whoa! -Ah!
Gotcha! Iggy, what's up? You're scooting like you've seen a ghost.
translation.ko: 잡았다! 이기, 왜 그래? 귀신이라도 봤냐?

translation.en: Not at ghost, a p-p-p-puppy!
A puppy? Kids…
C'mon, crew. Let's go say hi to the new neighbors.
We're bringing my famous peppermint cookies
to welcome them to the neighborhood.
-That's okay, I'll stay here. -What about our investigation?
translation.ko: 전 여기 있을게요 조사 안 할 거야?

translation.en: Don't you wanna know if they are evil unicorn bots who love music?
translation.ko: 음악 좋아하는 사악한 로봇 유니콘인지 안 궁금해?

translation.en: Fine, I'll come. For science.
-[barking] -[Iggy] Oh, no!
-[Rosie] Watch out! -[Arthur yells]
-Come on, boo. -I gotcha, buddy.
Sorry I doubted you, Iggy. That puppy is fierce!
translation.ko: 이기, 아까 놀려서 미안 강아지가 엄청 사납네

translation.en: -It's okay. -[boy] Calypso!
-Heel mode, activate. -[watch beeps]
Sorry about that. He's usually friendly.
-There must be a glitch in his code. -[man] Don't worry, he doesn't bite.
translation.ko: - 코드에 오류가 있나 봐요 - 걱정 마세요, 안 물어요

translation.en: -Unless my son programmed him to. -[kids giggle]
How you doing? I'm Beck.
-This is Benny and Bee-Bee. -Hello.
We're the Twists. Aisha, Amari, Ada and Arthur.
translation.ko: 트위스트 가족이에요 아이샤, 아마리, 에이다, 아서요

translation.en: And this is Iggy and Rosie.
-Hey. -Hey, how you doing?
Miss Sugarpie loves cookies!
[chuckles] Well, good thing we have some right here.
-Welcome to the neighborhood. -Thank you!
Bee-Bee, do we shake down our guests for cookies?
translation.ko: 비비, 인형 핑계로 손님들한테 쿠키 달랬니?

translation.en: No, Glammy.
You can't knock the hustle, though, right?
-[laughing] -You know that's right.
I'm Grandma, or as I prefer, Glam-Ma.
translation.ko: 난 얘들 할머니인데 멋쟁이 할머니라고 불러줘요

translation.en: Come, sit, tell me everything about this lovely town.
translation.ko: 들어가서 이 멋진 동네에 대해 전부 다 얘기해 줘요

translation.en: -[alarm beeps] -[yelps] Oh, man! Really?!
-Gotta fix that code! -[calypso barking]
Wait for me! -Whoa! [sighs] -[barking]
[sighs] Okay, I fixed the code.
Calypso, sit. Stay… Good bot.
-He's cute, right? -[giggles]
-Benny made him. -Yep.
-From recycled materials. -Fab!
translation.ko: - 오빠 작품이야 - 맞아, 재활용품으로 만들었어 - 굉장하다! - 완전 대단해!

translation.en: -Wow! -Love that!
It's cool, right?
I was born without a hand, but I get to have this awesome one!
translation.ko: 난 손 없이 태어났지만 이런 멋진 걸 장착했어!

translation.en: Miss Sugarpie picked the color.
-Awesome! -Amazing!
Nice turntable. My dad has one.
-Is this a control panel? -Ooh! For a spaceship?
-That's Benny's DJ controller. -DJ?
Dance party! Come on!
Thanks. Maybe… uh… another time?
[giggles] Comet Quest? Best TV show on the planet!
translation.ko: '혜성 탐사' 포스터네? 지상 최고의 TV 쇼지

translation.en: Doctor Galactic is a boss!
"We don't rest until we quest!"
[gasps] I have an idea. You should watch it with us this weekend, Benny.
translation.ko: 좋은 생각 있어 주말에 우리랑 같이 보자, 베니

translation.en: -Um… I don't know. -[Arthur] Who's this?
Anyone ever tell you guys? You're really nosy.
-More like curious. -Totally.
That's my cousin, Dre. Watching Comet Quest is our thing.
translation.ko: 얘는 내 사촌 드레야 '혜성 탐사'도 늘 같이 봐

translation.en: 'Til we moved here.
I have an observation. I think you're homesick.
translation.ko: 발견한 게 있어 넌 고향이 그리운 거 같아

translation.en: I do miss home a lot.
But we're not going back.
Maybe we can help. We're scientists.
-Yeah. -We figure stuff out.
Kids. Your dads are having a debate about which instrument is the funkiest.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 아빠들이 어떤 악기가 최고인지 입씨름 중이야

translation.en: They'll be a while. You coming home with me?
translation.ko: 한참 걸릴 텐데, 먼저 집에 갈까?

translation.en: Can Benny come home and brainstorm with us?
translation.ko: 베니도 데려가서 같이 아이디어 짜도 돼?

translation.en: If it's okay with his dad, sure.
-Bee-Bee, sweetie, your Glammy wants you. -Okay. Bye!
translation.ko: 비비, 할머니가 너 찾으셔 네, 안녕!

translation.en: -Later! -Bye!
Come on, man, the bass is the backbone.
Let's brainstorm about how to get Benny back home.
Say what?
♪ Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪
♪ Throw in every thought you've had No idea is ever bad ♪
translation.ko: 모든 생각을 쏟아부어 나쁜 아이디어는 없어

translation.en: -♪ Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪ -♪ Gather up your friends, try ♪
translation.ko: 아이디어 짜기 친구들과 함께 어떻게, 뭘, 왜인지 알아내

translation.en: -♪ To find the how ♪ -♪ The what ♪
translation.ko: 친구들과 함께 어떻게, 뭘, 왜인지 알아내

translation.en: -♪ The why ♪ -♪ Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪
♪ Let our imaginations Become great new creations ♪
translation.ko: 우리의 상상력이 멋지고 새로운 창조물이 되지

translation.en: ♪ When we brainstorm, brainstorm! Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪ ♪ Hey! ♪
translation.ko: 우리가 아이디어를 짜고 짜고 또 짜면 헤이!

translation.en: We could hook Benny up to a jetpack.
He'd get home in no time.
But I think they take a lot of practice to control.
What if we made the fastest underground train to take you super fast?
translation.ko: 세상에서 가장 빠른 지하철을 만들면 어떨까?

translation.en: -[Ada] Let's go! -[Benny] Whoa!
The permits we'd have to get to tunnel through all the gopher cities down there? Ugh!
translation.ko: 허가도 없이 땅다람쥐의 지하 도시에 터널을 뚫자고?

translation.en: Nightmare!
-Right. Who wants to deal with that? -Ooh! An idea's downloading.
translation.ko: 맞다, 그것만은 피해야지 나도 아이디어 다운로드했어

translation.en: What if we make a bot
that can run as fast as the fastest man alive?
translation.ko: 가장 빨리 달리는 사람만큼 빠른 로봇이라면

translation.en: He can take me home and get me back here before my family misses me.
translation.ko: 우리 가족 몰래 날 데리고 다녀올 수 있어

translation.en: That would be freaky, and amazing! But what if the bot won't stop?
translation.ko: 겁나긴 해도 끝내주는데? 그런데 로봇이 멈추지 않으면 어쩌지?

translation.en: Yeah, that would be insane in the mainframe.
translation.ko: 그럼 중앙 컴퓨터에서 난리 나는 거지

translation.en: Ugh! I wish I could just snap my fingers
and beam you home like Doctor Galactic would.
That's it! I'll make a teleportation device
like Doctor Galactic's in Comet Quest!
-That would be space-tastic! -I don't know.
translation.ko: 우주적으로 환상적이다 글쎄, 순간이동은 과학자들도 성공 못 했어

translation.en: Scientists haven't figured out teleportation yet.
translation.ko: 글쎄, 순간이동은 과학자들도 성공 못 했어

translation.en: Isn't that more like science fiction than actual science?
translation.ko: 그건 공상과학 영화에나 나오는 거 아냐?

translation.en: Lots of things were sci-fi before they were science.
Cell phones,
space stations,
-robot puppies. -[barking]
-You're right. -True.
If you wanna change stuff, you gotta think big!
And I have to try, or I'm never going home again.
translation.ko: 시도는 해봐야지 아니면 다신 고향에 못 가니까

translation.en: You're right.
Scientists try impossible stuff all the time.
-They do. -Yeah.
Okay. My gears are turning. Since Comet Quest is my jam,
translation.ko: 좋아, 생각 회로 작동 '혜성 탐사' 광팬으로서

translation.en: I've done a lot of research on teleportation.
translation.ko: 순간이동에 관해 조사해 둔 게 많아

translation.en: I think I know how to do it.
You have a hypothesis?
A hypothe-what now?
-[laughing] -♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪ ♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
-♪ Does that… ♪ -♪ Observation ♪
-♪ Mean this… ♪ - ♪Explanation? ♪
♪ Right or wrong Let's find out what the answer is ♪
♪ It might not be right But we're gonna find out ♪
♪ What this theory is all about ♪
♪ An educated guess ♪
-♪ Will it stand up to our test? ♪ -♪ That's what a hypothesis is ♪
translation.ko: - 경험에서 우러난 추측 - 테스트를 통과할까? 맞아, 그게 가설이야

translation.en: ♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪ ♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
♪ Let's find out how right it is ♪
♪ Let's go! ♪
To teleport, you have to travel faster than the speed of light.
translation.ko: 순간이동 하려면 빛의 속도보다 빨리 이동해야 해

translation.en: So, my hypothesis is, if I can do that,
translation.ko: 그러니까 내가 세운 가설은 빛보다 빠르면 순간이동이 가능하다는 거야

translation.en: I can beam myself home.
But no one's traveled faster than the speed of light.
translation.ko: 하지만 빛의 속도보다 빨리 이동한 사람은 없어

translation.en: Yet. But maybe we could if we made a Beaming Booth,
translation.ko: 아직은 그렇지만 번쩍 부스를 만들면 가능해

translation.en: like Doctor Galactic's teleportation machine.
-That's true. -Let's do it!
Loading the lab…
This is bomb-dot-com! Hold the smartphone!
translation.ko: 여기 짱 멋진데! 다들 동작 그만! 이거 뽑기 기계야?

translation.en: You have a claw machine? And a driving simulation machine? And…
translation.ko: 다들 동작 그만! 이거 뽑기 기계야? 운전 시뮬레이션 장비? 윈드 터널까지?

translation.en: [voice echos] …and a wind tunnel?!
-[laughing] -Now I'm being really nosy.
You're gonna fit right in, Benny.
Especially with this.
Wow! This looks like it was made just for me.
Aw! Thank you.
You're welcome. Now, let's get to work.
-I could design the Beaming Booth. -And I could build it.
translation.ko: - 번쩍 부스 설계할게 - 난 제작을 맡지

translation.en: Only problem is, Doctor Galactic used supplies from seven different planets.
translation.ko: 갤럭틱 박사는 일곱 개 행성의 재료를 썼다는 게 문제야

translation.en: Since we have to stay on Earth, we can see what's in my garage.
translation.ko: 우린 지구에만 있을 거니까 내 차고에서 재료를 찾자

translation.en: -[kids giggle] -But the keys add the magic.
The bass keeps your feet tapping.
Ta-da!
I programmed it using the speed of the world's fastest animals.
translation.ko: 세상에서 가장 빠른 동물들의 속도로 프로그래밍했어

translation.en: The peregrine falcon, cheetah, and black marlin.
With all that speed, this is definitely gonna work.
Thanks for helping me, guys. I'm going home to see Dre. Benny B. out!
translation.ko: 도와줘서 고마워 난 드레 만나러 고향에 간다 베니 비 로그아웃!

translation.en: Wait. We should test it first to make sure it's safe.
Oh, yeah, you're right. Benny B. in.
I guess I could sacrifice my egg salad sandwich… for science.
translation.ko: 내 달걀 샐러드 샌드위치를 희생할게 과학을 위해서

translation.en: That'll work.
Hit it, Benny!
-[Benny] It worked! -Mind blown!
-[giggles] -Guys, I don't think it did. Look.
-Bummer. -Phooey.
Things don't always work out on the first try.
But you programmed it with so much speed.
We can brainstorm new ideas.
No, this has to work.
What travels faster than the speed of light?
Think, Benny, think!
Ooh! Maybe sound!
-I'm not sure if that's true. -It's gonna work. It just has to.
translation.ko: 그건 아닌 거 같아 이번엔 성공할 거야, 반드시

translation.en: -Okay… -Let's fire it up!
-[sighs] -It's okay, Benny.
Even the best scientists in the world haven't cracked the teleportation code.
translation.ko: 세계 최고의 과학자들도 순간이동 코드는 못 알아냈어

translation.en: Code! I just need the right code!
-[Rosie] Yikes! -[Ada] Oh, no!
-[Ada gasps] -I'm so sorry!
You tried to help, let me use your lab and everything,
translation.ko: 날 도와주고 연구실도 맘껏 쓰게 해줬는데

translation.en: and I knocked out the power. And I'm still not going back home.
translation.ko: 정전까지 일으켰네 게다가 고향에도 못 가고

translation.en: -Sorry, Benny. -[barks]
I crossed my fingers and toes that it would work.
translation.ko: 손가락 발가락 다 꼬아서 성공을 빌었는데

translation.en: It might've been a flop,
but you didn't stop.
You've got grit, B.
We didn't figure out how to teleport you home,
but I have a theory.
Maybe making new friends can cure your homesickness.
translation.ko: 새 친구들을 사귀면 그리움이 덜할 거야

translation.en: Come on, watch Comet Quest with us.
[all] "We don't rest until we quest!"
That was the business! 'Night, kids.
Another out-of-this-world episode! I'm gonna see what Dre thought.
translation.ko: 오늘 내용도 정말 재밌었어 드레랑 얘기해 볼래

translation.en: I found a way to stay close.
You were right. It was time for a new idea. Bam!
Ham radio!
I can use it to talk to Dre from anywhere.
The signal's so strong that you can even bounce it off of the moon.
[Rosie] Fab-tastic!
Luckily, Dre doesn't live that far away.
Dre, it's me!
[Dre] B, can you believe Doctor Galactic finally made it
translation.ko: 비, 갤럭틱 박사가 드디어 성공한 거 봤어?

translation.en: to all the moons around Jupiter?
Next level, right?
Say hi to my new friends, Ada, Iggy, and Rosie.
translation.ko: 새 친구들 소개할게 에이다, 이기, 로지야

translation.en: -Howdy. -Hi.
-[Dre] Hey. -I miss you so much!
But at least we can talk all the time with this.
translation.ko: 그래도 무전기로 언제든 얘기할 수 있어

translation.en: Me too, but I'm glad you have new friends. I can't wait to meet them.
translation.ko: 나도, 근데 새 친구들 생겨서 좋네 나도 빨리 만나고 싶어

translation.en: -Love you, cuz. -Love you, B.
Call you tomorrow.
Aw! Your cousin seems awesome. Just like you.
translation.ko: 네 사촌도 너처럼 멋진 애 같아

translation.en: We're happy you're not an evil unicorn bot that loves music.
translation.ko: 음악 좋아하는 사악한 로봇 유니콘이 아니라 다행이야

translation.en: Huh! I'm definitely not.
But an evil, music-loving unicorn bot sounds wicked.
translation.ko: 하지만 음악 좋아하는 사악한 로봇 유니콘은 소름 끼친다

translation.en: Adding that to my list of ideas for comic book villains.
translation.ko: 내 만화책에 쓸 악당 목록에 넣어야겠어

translation.en: According to my calculations,
this is gonna be the start of a beautiful friendship.
translation.ko: 이건 아름다운 우정의 시작인 거 같아

translation.en: -Yeah! -[all laugh]
